nodes.text: Vanguerre XI was the location that the artisans of the Vanguerre Artists' Workshop were based prior to the group's dissolution on the eve of the Clone Wars, which began in the year 22 BBY.
Vanguerre XI was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Incredible Cross-Sections, a reference book written by Jason Fry, and released on December 15, 2017.
